title: We paid a Pro to do Troll Builds: Planetary Fortress Rush | Twitch Plays Astrea #2 - StarCraft 2
excerpt: We paid Astrea to do some Troll builds on ladder, this time a Planetary Fortress Rush - everyone's favourite request! Like the Thundershaft that he is, he used his Rank 1 account and wowed us all with his skills  Follow Astrea's Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/zastrea -- üê∑ Second Channel for Learning
